last_episode_to_air.name: When Two (Messes) Become One
last_episode_to_air.overview: A pair of newlyweds with two dogs corral all their pet items, then learn the magic of using boxes to keep drawers and cabinets tidy.

name: Tidying Up with Marie Kondo
overview: In a series of inspiring home makeovers, world-renowned tidying expert Marie Kondo helps clients clear out the clutter -- and choose joy.

episodes.name: Tiddying with Toddlers
episodes.overview: A married couple with two young children find peace as they learn how to pare down playroom clutter, keep the kitchen organized and sort clothes.

episodes.name: Empty Nesters
episodes.overview: Marie helps a retired couple reclaim their space by showing them how cut back on clothing, store Christmas decor and display old family photographs.

episodes.name: The Downsizers
episodes.overview: Marie shows a family living in a cramped apartment how to create temporary storage solutions and make better use of hard-to-reach cabinet space.

episodes.name: Sparking Joy After a Loss
episodes.overview: A grieving widow gets a fresh start as she learns how to properly store her purses, make a memory box and say goodbye to the things she no longer needs.

episodes.name: From Students to Improvements
episodes.overview: Two writers work together to reduce their library, sort through sentimental items and get their cords and electronic gadgets under control.

episodes.name: Breaking Free from a Mountain of Stuff
episodes.overview: Marie teaches a married couple with two children and way too much stuff how to fold scarves, get rid of old toys and tame their garage.

episodes.name: Making Room for Baby
episodes.overview: An expectant couple with their first little one on the way get tips for organizing shoes, folding socks and toppling a mountain of accumulated paper.

episodes.name: When Two (Messes) Become One
episodes.overview: A pair of newlyweds with two dogs corral all their pet items, then learn the magic of using boxes to keep drawers and cabinets tidy.
